Hi All...

how I can create this background image and white area below of that background image in DND area ?

<https://prnt.sc/umgzzy>

that I know but in HubSpot theme background image is applying on

.dnd_area_main_banner-row-0-background-image

if later on client move this module in 2nd place then this class will not work
you can create a custom module
and place this at the exact position
that’s probably going to be the best solution, since we can’t ID specific items
in that case my background image will be full width but content will also be full width which I want to be in center position

I had a similar template issue. I created the first section as a template partial with a DND area within a wrapper. This allowed the bg image to be set on the wrapper class. Added another DND area below for the remaining content.
